wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Riley (March 1882 – November 1942) was an English professional football full back who played in the Football League for Blackburn Rovers and Aston Villa.

response: Thomas or Tom Riley may refer to:
*Tom Riley (Iowa politician) (1929–2011), lawyer and member of both houses of the Iowa legislature
*Tom Riley (rugby union) (born 1985), Welsh rugby union player
*Tom Riley (tattoo artist) (19th century), early British tattoo artist
